body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices          Harkers Island Visitor Center Park Headquarters 131 Charles Street Harkers Island, NC 28531  Staff Contacts Visitor Information General Questions (252) 728-2250 ext. 0     Hours Sunday through Saturday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Closed New Year's, Thanksgiving, and Christmas Days  Telephone (252) 728-2250 FAX (252) 728-2160 e-Mail CALO_Information@nps.gov Office Hours Monday through Friday 8:30AM - 4:30PM Closed on federal holidays        Superintendent Pat Kenney (252) 728-2250 ext. 3014  Administration Katherine Cushinberry (252) 728-2250 ext. 3019 Education & Public Programs BG Horvat (252) 728-2250 ext. 3005 Natural & Cultural Resources Jeri DeYoung (252) 728-2250 ext. 3012 Visitor & Resource Protection Jill Jaworski (252) 728-2250 ext. 3034 Facility Management Mike Baker (252) 728-2250 ext. 3011 Volunteers in the Park Steve Neshkoff (252) 728-2250 ext. 3008              Visitor Centers Directions, hours, and facilities for each of Cape Lookout's four Visitor Centers. more...
title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Our Staff & Offices
